description:
Don’t let a little snow keep you off of the trails. Floating on wide tires, the Fat Bike 3 lets you explore mucky and snowy terrain on 2-wheels. Moose has paired their light and strong aluminum frame with quality components, creating a ride worthy of the most dedicated fat bikers. Out front a Wren Sports carbon fibre fork helps absorb some of the trail’s vibration and keeps weight to a minimum. Shifts are handled by a 12-speed Shimano Deore drivetrain. This proven gearset is easy to maintain and gives you plenty of mechanical advantage to help turn mountains into molehills. If you want to work on your bike-body separation, the TranzX dropper post takes you from climbing to ready position at the push of a lever. And your speed is kept right where you want it by powerful Tektro hydraulic disc brakes. If you are looking to get out into that winter wonderland, but snowshoeing isn’t for you, Moose has you covered.

  • 6061 aluminum frame has an excellent strength to weight ratio
  • Wren Sports No-Nonsense carbon fibre rigid fork is comfortably stiff and is equipped with a forged 6061 aluminum crown and dropouts
  • TranzX dropper post offers 150mm of freedom at the push of a lever
  • Shimano SLX rear derailleur is matched to Deore shifters for crisp fast shifts and an incredibly reliable drivetrain
  • Tecktro hydraulic disc brakes have ample power in all conditions, even slush and muck
  • Vee Snowball tires are tubeless ready and have a tread pattern that excels on snow, ice, mud, and loose dirt. If you need even more grip or are riding on ice, these tires are stud-able (studs not included)
  • SUN Mulefüt 80SL v.2 wheels are light and rigid, providing excellent handling, and they come tubeless ready
  • Internal cable routing reduces the chances of snagging and gives the bike a clean look
name: Moose Bicycle Fat Bike 3 Bicycle - Unisex
